com.aryaktheboss.algorithims

Class AES

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aryaktheboss.algorithims.AES
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encryptor

    public class AES
extends java.lang.Object
implements Encryptor
    This class will encrypt your data using the standard AES-128 encryption algorithim 128 bit is the only current key length
    Author:
    UnityBoss
